DOC.brief_summary: Safety, Immunogenicity and Efficacy of an Adjuvanted Quadrivalent Subunit Influenza Virus Vaccine Compared to Non-Adjuvanted Comparator Influenza Vaccine in Children ≥6 to <72 Months of Age.
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Study to Evaluate the Safety, Immunogenicity and Efficacy of Investigational Flu Vaccine Compared to Approved Flu Vaccine in Children.
DOC.criteria: Children, males and females, healthy or at high risk of complications from influenza, between ≥6 months to <72 months of age Documented consent provided by the subject's parent(s)/legal guardian(s) Subjects and/or subject's parent(s)/legal guardian(s) able to comply with all study procedures. Children with history of allergy to vaccine components. Additional eligibility criteria may be discussed by contacting the site
